title: [GAMEPLAY] Gnar's Dance has no voice
body:
When dancing Gnar has no audio like he used to do but you can hear his boomerang rattle.

I've tried dancing in all the games I've played with him, a friend of mine messaged me because she saw I was playing him and asked if Gnar was making sounds when he dances because it wasn't working for her as well.
So the problem isn't only for me.

Sorry for low quality video I do not have a strong PC.

Video: 
http://webmshare.com/play/n8JYE

{{champion:150}}  Oh and I really enjoy Gnar, I find him to be a great champ that suits my needs.

replies.body:
Hey Nephow!

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue that we're hoping to have resolved for next patch! :]
Known issue, I believe a Rioter said it's being fixed next patch.
Alright, Thank you for informing me.
I think the video is... kinda bugged aswell. {{champion:150}}
Well, there is a looping sound in the background and it's displaying a still image.
